txt.en: Isengard has moved some advanced siege-craft south to attack Helm's Deep. You should count the different types of siege-craft to learn more of the enemy.

Saruman's interest in war machinery has grown of late, for he now employs many siege-weapons for his intended attack upon Helm's Deep.\n\nHopefully you can help the defenders of Helm's Deep with your knowledge of the enemy.
Isengard has moved some advanced siege-craft south to attack Helm's Deep. You should count the different types of siege-craft to learn more of the enemy.

Saruman's interest in war machinery has grown of late, for he now employs many siege-weapons for his intended attack upon Helm's Deep.\n\nHopefully you can help the defenders of Helm's Deep with your knowledge of the enemy.
Siege-craft and war machines can be found in Shatorthum.\n\nYou should examine the different types of weapons to learn of the technology that Isengard harbours.
